summary: The Republic of Serbia  is a country in Southeastern Europe.
full_text: The coat of arms of Serbia is a re-introduction of the coat of arms of the Kingdom of Serbia  adopted by the Republic of Serbia in 2004 and later slightly redesigned in 2010. The coat of arms consists of two main heraldic symbols which represent the national identity of the Serbian people across the centuries, the Serbian eagle  and the Serbian cross .
title: Coat of arms of Serbia
